title: Immunology of Fungal Infections {Nil}
description:
Book Description
Publication Date: 2007
ISBN: 978-1402054921
Editor: Gordon D.Brown, Mihai G.Netea
Format: pdf

This text covers all aspects of the immunology of fungal infection. Beyond the basics, coverage includes recent developments in innate and adaptive immunological mechanisms involved in the host response to fungal infection. The volumeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s topical sections provide an immunological perspective on the cells, soluble factors and receptors involved in recognising and combating fungal infections. Discussion includes descriptions of immunity to specific pathogens, immune-escape mechanisms used by fungi, and therapeutic strategies
